title: 489. Is “Toxic Positivity” a Thing?
description: In this special episode of No Stupid Questions, Stephen Dubner and Angela Duckworth discuss the consequences of seeing every glass as at least half-full.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
